website_summaries.verdict: You want to give this gel a try if your child is at risk for lice; or if you just want a pleasant-smelling, medium hold hair gel with moisturizing ingredients.
pros: A dual-purpose hair gel with rosemary that naturally repels most lice
Formulated with moisturizing plant-based ingredients like tea tree oil that moisturize hair
cons: Contains some unnatural ingredients, but fragrance isn't phthalate-based
May not work for preventing all lice outbreaks
Reports of leaking bottles upon arrival

customer_reviews.author: Darlinm1

customer_reviews.author: N. W. DeSantis

customer_reviews.title: Smells like rosemary and tea tree
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes the scent and asks me to spray it on before brushing her hair. It works well as a detangler, I've been using it on her for a few years and she hasn't had lice yet. Of course, I've also warned her against sharing combs, hats, and hair accessories, but this doesn't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Z

customer_reviews.title: Potent smell, not a fan
customer_reviews.text: This product smelled so terrible. It smelled like I was spraying cleaning products onto my hair. Would not recommend. Not sure if it repels lice but it sure would repel other humans. I plan on watering it down with sweet-smelling essential oils and see if the smell is more tolerable. I'll update my review again once I try that.
customer_reviews.author: Araceli

customer_reviews.title: No more lice
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We have been using this for a couple years now to prevent lice. Lice is an ongoing problem in our school. Since we started with this product we have had no lice in our home. Packaging could be a bit better. Lids need to be taped and more bubble wrap. No troubles this time but have had leaking containers in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Stegenga

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Read this Review
customer_reviews.text: It’s very rare that I use FairTales on my daughters hair! I have used the spray conditioner on her hair to get a tough knot out (& it worked, lol) I spray FairyTales products on my daughters school clothes, school shoes, backpack, winter accessories & coat. (Cubbyholes, lockers & coatracks are the snuggly areas at school) FairyTales really does work as a preventative measure against Lice. The smell isn’t that potent for her or her classmates because I spray the school clothes and school stuff in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: MissDetroitLA

customer_reviews.title: The only way to truly keep the love away is a thorough combing once a week
customer_reviews.text: The only way to truly keep the love away is a thorough combing once a week. I found beginning stages of lice on my kids and then combed daily until all nits were gone. The chemicals do not work. So we washed and conditioned. I had them sit in the tub with their hair coated in this conditioner and a shower cap for 15 minutes and then combed while they were still in the tub. Not fun, no matter what you do, but so much easier and probably more effective.
customer_reviews.author: ARA

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product
customer_reviews.text: After my 3 granddaughters having head lice 9 times my daughter was desperate. I bought this after a school nurse recommended it. That was 2 years ago. The girls have not had lice since. Their hair is soft and silky and smells great. This stuff is well worth the price. A little bit is all that is needed and the bottles last a long time. So don't let the price scare you off
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful detangler!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter has been using this conditioning spray for the past year. It is wonderful for her very thick hair!!! It is wonderful at getting the tangles out, smoothing the fly-aways, and leaving her hair soft and smooth. She has also been lice free since she started using it despite a high prevalence of lice in her classrooms! We have been very happy with this product throughout the past year.
customer_reviews.author: CMCL

customer_reviews.title: Just dont.
customer_reviews.text: This product does absolutely nothing to prevent lice! This was my last line of denfense against the school my kids go to! There is a very active and very constant lice problem in that school. I bought this because i was treating my kids and theyd come back with another bug or two a week later inbetween times i could treat. I was going out of my mind and was told about this so i figured give it a try. We use the shampoo/ conditioner the conditioning spray and the hair spray! None of it worked! I have switched to using the Vamousse products (shampoo) and i have seen a noticeable difference using that! Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn Redford

customer_reviews.title: It's just that a repellent and a good choice for when children are around many other children ...
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant smell (kids don't mind it) and provides some repellent but don't expect 100% results They can still get lice while using this product. Several of my friends use this with their kids as well and some have still gotten lice. It's just that a repellent and a good choice for when children are around many other children such as in school, church, summer camps etc. However, I can't account for consistency of use. With ours, so far, it has worked fine with consistent use. I'll update as needed.
customer_reviews.author: StrongFamilies

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: I received mine today in the mail and I was disappointed that the cap was broken, it didn’t spill but its broken and it will be hard to use with a broken cap.. anyway, I have used this product for quite some time on my daughter. She hasn't caught lice from her classmates at all and I check her hair periodically. This is the best deal for the price. I use to buy the 12oz from target every time she was out and that was almost $15 everytime. It smells good too, it works good. Its a great product just a little disappointed the cap was broken.
customer_reviews.author: kayy

customer_reviews.title: Lice prevention/ Smells good
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product after seeing people raving on facebook about it for lice prevention. I spray it on the kids hair every morning while styling it before school. We love the essential oils used and it smells good. So far it seems to be working! We also use a tea tree shampoo and conditioner in the Maple Holistics brand, but if we didn't have it, I would definitely consider buying that in this brand as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: Not real or bad batch. Have used for years and this is not at all like what I have bought in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: A Must in our home
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and conditioner. I can not say specifically if it prevents/repels lice. But I can say the 3 months that we ran out and used other stuff my daughter came home with lice. Makes me itch typing it. So I now keep it in stock for everyday use. The smell is great. Very fresh like rosemary. The conditioner also does a nice job at keeping the hair manageable for entangling. I am also a teacher and use it regularly. Can't be too careful.
customer_reviews.author: Renee S

customer_reviews.title: This really has worked wonders
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this but I had nothing to lose after having to cut my son's hair twice b/c he got lice from school. I've gotten over 5 notices after buying this that there have been other kids with lice in his classroom and I can sleep well knowing that I've not noticed any scratching or itching on his head. If you don't mind the somewhat strong smell when applying it then I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: ana laura martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great preventative, lovely smell, practical for up dos 10/10
customer_reviews.text: This is a great preventative product. I use it when there’s an outbreak at school as a safety measure and haven’t been let down yet. It goes on lightly without a heavy feeling, keeps your hair smooth in up dos, and smells great. The conditioning isn’t it’s strongest quality, but there is increased softness after regular use. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Luscious locks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old after there was a lice breakout at school. The smell is a little strong at first but once you get used to it - its not so bad. Her hair is soft and we use it several times a week. I will continue to use it and I got it cheaper on Amazon than what I saw it in the store for so that's a bonus
customer_reviews.author: macjune02

customer_reviews.title: No more love problems with everyday use!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! It's a bit of a strong scent, but we haven't had a single spout with love since useing this product!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Adams

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo and spray for my 3 year old. There has already been a minor lice breakout at her school and she didn’t have any issues. There is a slightly strong rosemary odor from the spray and shampoo, but it’s fine by me if it means no lice. It’s strongest when you spray the spray and are using the shampoo, but once hair dries and you’re done spraying the odor dies off tremendously. Must have for anyone trying to avoid lice!!
customer_reviews.author: Practical Mama

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Can say for sure if it works against lice (prevention) but my son got lice from our trip back to France and I have been using those products on myself and I didn't get lice. It smells sooooo good. That's going to my son shampoo and conditioner for when he start school next year, for sure!!! Doesn't make my hair oily. Great natural shampoo and conditioner. As a prevention against lice I just add some lavender essential oil behind my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Celine

customer_reviews.title: We love this spray! Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product for my little girl! After her bath, she always asks for the 'Castle Spray'. It helps to de-tangle her hair and make it really soft! Also, one of her friends had lice (we found out the day after a play date), and my daughter never got lice (even though some other kids did). Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item due to having 5 girls with very long hair! Every once in a while they bring bugs from school. Old school home remedy was to put vinegar in their hair this would kill the big lice adults and their eggs, BUT of course the girls would hate it... cause of the strong smell. So i decided to look into something else. Found this one, based on good reviews i purchased. Smell is not horrible. I leave the conditioner over night. Today, i comb out hair and some if the lice were already dead. I will recommend and keep on buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Esco

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had a lice scare so unsure about it's effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo makes my daughters hair soft and a little less frizzy. I don't care much for the smell but you usually can't smell it after it's dried anyway. Also, we haven't had an issue with lice at school yet so I don't know much about how effective it is at deterring lice but I'll keep using it. Rather safe than sorry. As for the spray, I spray it on her roots in the morning when I'm brushing her hair for school. Smells a little funky but the scent usually doesn't last too long.
customer_reviews.author: Jonie L. Neese

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Was supposed to receive it a week ago according to original shipping info. That info changed over the weekend but seriously I ordered it over a week ago with 2 day shipping. That is a bit frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: markamanda

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved and mom loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using fairy tales since my daughter was about 18 mos old. I have to order the huge one now with two daughters and extremely long hair. We use this daily. We haven’t had one issue yet. My girls love the smell of it. It lathers up really good and rinses clean. Just remember this is lice prevention and if you have lice already you have buy the kit for the removal.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: No More Lice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after lice spread through my daughters school. First I treated the lice with Fairy Tales natural treatment foam with added vinegar rinses and was able to completely rid her of the lice. Then I followed up with this repel conditioner and a repel shampoo. It must have worked well to help keep the lice away because she hasn't had any more issues with the pesky bugs, even with them still actively going around her classroom. So far so good, no lice. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: A necessity! My kids had lice once and man that was a pain in the butt. We started using Fairy Tales products after that experience and haven’t had lice since. They made it through 2 lice breakouts in their schools since then and haven’t caught it again, so I’m going to assume this stuff works. And aside from that, it’s a noticeable difference when my kids use this shampoo and conditioner. Their hair is much softer and easier to handle. We use it about 3-4x/week for the school year and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any child
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for years. I put it on every morning before my daughter goes to school, dance, or gymnastics,. She has never had lice in this also works as a great hair detangler. We really like the smell of it in the bottle seems to last a couple of months with almost daily use. I would highly recommend for anyone who has a child in school or that is around other kids to help prevent lice.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse123

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER! Start using BEFORE your kids get lice!
customer_reviews.text: Since we went through TWO separate infestations of lice in ONE year with two blonde daughters with waist length hair, we have used nothing but Fairy Tales Rosemary Repel shampoo. That was over 3 years ago. I refuse to wash their hair with anything else. It has a strong rosemary scent, which is what it is. I would prefer that it smell like tangerines, but then it wouldn’t repel lice, I guess. It also irritates eyes, so you have to be careful with small children. Overall, it’s a lifesaver for us.
customer_reviews.author: I Am Sam

customer_reviews.title: We shall see
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shampoo ,conditioner and conditioning spray after a lice incident with my daughter... I notice the scent of the shampoo and conditioner pretty much washes out immediately but the scent from the conditioning spray seems to last for the whole day. It doesn't do a great job cleansing or conditioning my daughter's curly hair, I know the same company does make a product for curly hair but it doesn't have the lice repelling sent that I was looking for...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I was told by another there already been a case of lice at the school and the nurse told me she didnt find any on my child or on her hair. I let the word out about this. She has really curly hair and the detangler in it is amazing!! I even spray it around the neck. The smell, smells like walking threw a garden. I will continue to purchase this as long as you make it. I have the spray and the refill bottle. After the New Years, I'll be ordering more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I will give credit to rosemary repel!
customer_reviews.text: So i ordered this after my daughter came home from daycare with lice. I did a treatment on her, and after i couldnt find anymore live lice, I started doing a daily wash with this shampoo and conditioner spray! I will give credit to this product! Luck or not, the lice stopped reappearing after i used this. I do believe it helped to repel the lice. Definitely glad and thankful i found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: Best Morning Hairstyling tool
customer_reviews.text: I usually do my girls' hair in the morning as they are shoving food in their mouth to get out the door to school. I love this spray I can use to detangle their hair and style it as needed. Not sure how effective of a lice deterrent it is, BUT we haven't had lice in this house so it must be working!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: SNRENBARGER

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair soft and smells lovely.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about a month with my son and the only complaint I have is that the smell is a bit overpowering when it first comes out of the bottle. Once I rinse his hair though it leaves a light, pleasant smell and his hair is incredibly soft after. Also, a little goes a long way so I feel the bottle A going to last a long time. I bought this since he was starting preschool and I wanted a preventative incase of any lice outbreaks at his school. So far there haven’t been any so I don’t know if it works but I’m encouraged by other reviews promising it does. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The bottles did not have a safety seal. They appeared to have been refilled and product in the bottle did not appear to be the original. In addition a lot of the product spilled out as it did not have the safety seal. Idont recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice but doesnt hold well
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, and I have no clue if it'll actually keep lice away, but it does not hold very well. My son has a haircut that can be styled into a mohawk on top. He is a typical boy, rolling around, touching his hair and whatever else he can do. This stuff holds no better than water. Im not really shocked because to get a good hold you need to put all those yucky chemicals into the gel. My kids have sensitive skin so I needed an organic product.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Chinn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protection agains lice!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever! I started using it a few years ago after my daughter got lice at school. I put it on my kids every morning before school and so far it’s been successful at protecting them against lice. I feel like it also helps to detangle their hair. Smells really good and it all natural. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hincapie

customer_reviews.title: No worries this stuff works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. My daughter started pre-k and I was so worried about her getting lice so I went ahead and bought a type a shampoo that helped but I kept on having to put her hair up because I wasn’t sure how well that would work. When I heard about how amazing this was I decided to go ahead and get it and must I say i am very impressed. I now am able to style her hair and leave it down so with using it for about 3 weeks already she has not came home with any. I love love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber92

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! My daughter is in middle school & a ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! My daughter is in middle school & a lot of students keep getting lice. Every time it happens I spend over $200 having lice patrol come to our house because bugs are not ok!! So disgusting! Anyway! A friend told me about this shampoo & we all love it. It smells nice, very gentle on our hair & we use it as our daily shampoo. It’s been almost a year since we’ve used this product & some of her friends have gotten lice from school but not us!! This shampoo is a must have in this day & age when parents aren’t diligent about staying on top of lice problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Princess 👸🏻 Protection
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Fairy Takes Rosemary Repel and it came completely wrapped in plastic and boxed nicely! Can’t wait to try this product out!
customer_reviews.author: MoMster

customer_reviews.title: Has worked
customer_reviews.text: We're in our sixth week of a lice outbreak at school. Used this during camp and during this school year and my daughter has been completely lice free despite multiple outbreaks of her classmates. She also has super long hair so we're extra worried because there's so much of it that we have to make sure she's covered. We even got some for us parents to use once a week. IT WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Love this Conditioer
customer_reviews.text: Love this conditioner, it leaves my hair smooth and soft (as smooth as it can get when you have curly/frizz hair). My daughter had lice and I immediately bought the whole package. Thankfully we caught it early and used Fairy Tales along with coconut oil and some EOs that I had and wiped them little critters out. We continue to use the shampoo and conditioner along with the detangler still (five months later).
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love all fairytale products!
customer_reviews.text: Love all fairytale products! I get the shampoo,conditioner and the hair spray. My girls use everyday before school. My oldest daughter got lice in kindergarten starting using this product after she got it and now she’s in 6th grade and we haven’t had lice since! Highly recommend for school age kids! You got to be about about using it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: So this is great. It works just like regular gel for your hair. The smell is not bad the only problem is that is not for every day use because it dehydrates my sons hair and the hairstyle doesn’t last long unless you put a lot on his hair
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily as a detangler on my daughter but I love the extra assurance of being a lice repellent. My daughter has never had lice (nor have I) so I can't comment on it's ability to truly prevent lice but she attends public school and I am a school director so we both use it daily. Possibly, it is the reason we have both remained lice free all of this time!
customer_reviews.author: Santos

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked that I give this product 5 1/2 stars. She really likes it. The smell and how well it detangles her hair. It's very natural smelling. No lice scares here, however it's a bonus that they make a detangler that helps prevent it without harsh chemicals. Glad I bought the 2 pack. We will definitely keep this as part of our morning routine.
customer_reviews.author: RRR
